data.title: Brown Plastic Surgery Center Celebrates 5 Consecutive Years of “Best Plastic Surgery” Award in CityBeat’s Best of Cincinnati
data.meta_description: Mandell-Brown Plastic Surgery Center was named #1 “Best Plastic Surgery” in CityBeat’s Best of Cincinnati 2024 awards for the 5th consecutive year!
data.text:
Mandell-Brown Plastic Surgery Center Celebrates 5 Consecutive Years of “Best Plastic Surgery” Award in CityBeat’s Best of Cincinnati

Cincinnati, OH /Press Advantage/ —The Mandell-Brown Plastic Surgery Center received the designation of #1 “Best Plastic Surgery” in CityBeat’s Best of Cincinnati 2024 awards for the fifth consecutive year, in addition to being recognized for their non-surgical med spa services.

“We are honored to be chosen yet again for this award,” commented Dr. Gina Maccarone, a fellowship-trained and triple board-certified surgeon known as “the surgoeonista” at Mandell-Brown Plastic Surgery Center. “We work to create a genuine, positive experience for our patients, and adhere to the highest standards of safety, including having a private, accredited surgical suite and requiring operating room staff to have extensive training and proper certifications.”

Both Dr. Maccarone and the practice’s Director, Dr. Mark-Mandell-Brown, strive to stand out among other cosmetic providers in the Tri-State area by specializing in Natural Look™ cosmetic surgery. “We aim to help our patients look better, not different,” said Dr. Mandell-Brown.

In addition to “Best Plastic Surgery,” CityBeat also rated the practice #1 in the categories of “Best Medi Spa” and “Best Skin Care Service” for the fifth consecutive year. The practice’s non-surgical services include Botox®-type injectables, dermal fillers, laser treatments, and microneedling. In addition to specializing in cosmetic surgery procedures for the face, breast, and body, the cosmetic surgeons offer a safe choice for non-surgical med spa treatments in the Cincinnati and Dayton area.

“We are proud to offer these popular aesthetic enhancements to our patients in a sterile, safe medical environment,” commented Dr. Mark Mandell-Brown, who founded the award-winning plastic surgery practice. “While there are more choices than ever as far as where to receive Botox and filler, patients appreciate that they can receive these from a board-certified cosmetic surgeon at our practice.”

To learn more or contact the practice, visit www.mandellbrown.com.

About Dr. Mandell-Brown: Dr. Mark Mandell-Brown is a triple-board certified plastic surgeon known throughout the Cincinnati Tri-State area for Natural Look™ cosmetic surgery. He serves as the Director of the Mandell-Brown Plastic Surgery Center and has over 30 years of experience performing facial, breast, and body procedures for thousands of patients. In addition to earning recognition from CityBeat Magazine, he has been named one of “Ohio’s Top Ten Plastic Surgeons, voted a “Top Doc” in Plastic Surgery by his physician peers in Cincinnati Magazine, and earned recognition in Cincinnati Magazine under Best Breast Augmentation, Best Rhinoplasty, and Best Face Lifts over the past decade.

Mandell-Brown Plastic Surgery Center offers cosmetic surgery in a private, comfortable surgical facility licensed by the State of Ohio Department of Health and accredited by AAAHC (Accreditation Association for Ambulatory Health Care). The practice proudly serves the greater Cincinnati and Dayton communities, with offices in both Cincinnati and Springboro, OH.
